channel.title: CVE Feed for HP Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2751|2024-08-05T14:02:07.685Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20240%20g1%20notebook%20pc%20and%20certain%20other%20consumer%20notebooks
item.description: A BIOS password extraction vulnerability has been reported on certain consumer notebooks with firmware F.22 and others. The BIOS password was stored in CMOS in a way that allowed it to be extracted. This applies to consumer notebooks launched in early 2014.

item.title: CVE-2017-2747|2024-08-05T14:02:07.778Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet%20printers%3B%20hp%20latex%20printers
item.description: HP has identified a potential security vulnerability before IG_11_00_00.10 for DesignJet T790, T795, T1300, T2300, before MRY_04_05_00.5 for DesignJet T920, T930, T1500, T1530, T2500, T2530, before AENEAS_03_04_00.9 for DesignJet T3500, before NEXUS_01_12_00.11 for Latex 310, 330, 360, 370, before NEXUS_03_12_00.15 for Latex 315, 335, 365, 375, before STORM_00_05_01.6 for Latex 560, 570 and Latex 110 that may expose the credentials of the SMTP server configured to receive and process emails generated by the printers.

item.title: CVE-2017-2740|2024-08-05T14:02:07.668Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified with the command line shell of the HP ThinPro operating system 6.1, 5.2.1, 5.2, 5.1, 5.0, and 4.4. The vulnerability could result in a local unauthorized elevation of privilege on an HP thin client device.

item.title: CVE-2017-2746|2024-08-05T14:02:07.621Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20jetadvantage%20security%20manager
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified with HP JetAdvantage Security Manager before 3.0.1. The vulnerabilities could potentially be exploited to allow stored cross-site scripting which could allow a hacker to create a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-2750|2024-08-05T14:02:07.641Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20laserjet%20enterprise%20printers%2C%20hp%20pagewide%20enterprise%20printers%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers%2C%20hp%20officejet%20enterprise%20printers
item.description: Insufficient Solution DLL Signature Validation allows potential execution of arbitrary code in HP LaserJet Enterprise printers, HP PageWide Enterprise printers, HP LaserJet Managed printers, HP OfficeJet Enterprise printers before 2308937_578479, 2405087_018548, and other firmware versions.

item.title: CVE-2017-2743|2024-08-05T14:02:07.579Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%20printers%20and%20mfps%3B%20hp%20officejet%20enterprise%20color%20printers%20and%20mfp%3B%20hp%20pagewide%20color%20printers%20and%20mps
item.description: HP has identified a potential security vulnerability with HP Enterprise LaserJet Printers and MFPs, HP OfficeJet Enterprise Color Printers and MFP, HP PageWide Color Printers and MPS before 2308214_000901, 2308214_000900, and other firmware versions. The vulnerability could be exploited to perform a cross site scripting (XSS) attack.

item.title: CVE-2019-18913|2024-08-05T02:02:39.823Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20intel-based%20business%20pcs%20that%20support%20microsoft%20windows%2010%20kernel%20dma%20protection.
item.description: A potential security vulnerability with pre-boot DMA may allow unauthorized UEFI code execution using open-case attacks. This industry-wide issue requires physically accessing internal expansion slots with specialized hardware and software tools to modify UEFI code in memory. This affects HP Intel-based Business PCs that support Microsoft Windows 10 Kernel DMA protection. Affected versions depend on platform (prior to 01.04.02; or prior to 02.04.01; or prior to 02.04.02).

item.title: CVE-2017-2745|2024-08-05T14:02:07.662Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20jetadvantage%20security%20manager
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified with HP JetAdvantage Security Manager before 3.0.1. The vulnerabilities could potentially be exploited to allow stored cross-site scripting which could allow a hacker to execute scripts in a user's browser.

item.title: CVE-2019-16283|2024-08-05T01:10:41.677Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20softpaq%20installer
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified with a version of the HP Softpaq installer that can lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-2742|2024-08-05T14:02:07.557Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20web%20jetadmin
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified with HP Web Jetadmin before 10.4 SR2. This vulnerability could potentially be exploited to create a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2018-5925|2024-08-05T05:47:56.119Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20inkjet%20printers
item.description: A security vulnerability has been identified with certain HP Inkjet printers. A maliciously crafted file sent to an affected device can cause a static buffer overflow, which could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-5924|2024-08-05T05:47:56.169Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20inkjet%20printers
item.description: A security vulnerability has been identified with certain HP Inkjet printers. A maliciously crafted file sent to an affected device can cause a stack buffer overflow, which could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-2741|2024-08-05T14:02:07.668Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pagewide%20printers%3B%20hp%20officejet%20pro%20printers
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified with HP PageWide Printers, HP OfficeJet Pro Printers, with firmware before 1708D. This vulnerability could potentially be exploited to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-5921|2024-08-05T05:47:56.098Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20enterprise%20printers%2C%20hp%20pagewide%20printers%2C%20and%20mfp%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified with certain HP printers and MFPs in 2405129_000052 and other firmware versions. This vulnerability is known as Cross Site Request Forgery, and could potentially be exploited remotely to allow elevation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2017-2744|2024-08-05T14:02:07.779Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20support%20assistant
item.description: The vulnerability allows attacker to extract binaries into protected file system locations in HP Support Assistant before 12.7.26.1.

item.title: CVE-2019-16284|2024-08-05T01:10:41.768Z -- hp%20inc. -- multiple%20-%20see%20https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.hp.com%2Frs-en%2Fdocument%2Fc06456250
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in multiple HP products and versions which involves possible execution of arbitrary code during boot services that can result in elevation of privilege. The EFI_BOOT_SERVICES structure might be overwritten by an attacker to execute arbitrary SMM (System Management Mode) code. A list of affected products and versions are available in https://support.hp.com/rs-en/document/c06456250.

item.title: CVE-2022-48219|2024-08-03T15:10:59.138Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20desktop%20pc%20products
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in certain HP Desktop PC products using the HP TamperLock feature, which might allow intrusion detection bypass via a physical attack. HP is releasing firmware and guidance to mitigate these potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2022-48220|2024-08-03T15:10:58.745Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20desktop%20pc%20products
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in certain HP Desktop PC products using the HP TamperLock feature, which might allow intrusion detection bypass via a physical attack. HP is releasing firmware and guidance to mitigate these potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2022-27540|2024-08-03T05:32:59.640Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in the HP BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure. HP is releasing BIOS updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-6138|2024-08-02T08:21:17.709Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20workstation%20pcs
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP Workstation PCs, which might allow escalation of privilege, arbitrary code execution, or denial of service. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28893|2024-08-02T01:03:50.249Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20software%20packages%20%28softpaqs%29
item.description: Certain HP software packages (SoftPaqs) are potentially vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when the SoftPaq configuration file has been modified after extraction. HP has released updated software packages (SoftPaqs).

item.title: CVE-2024-29080|2024-08-02T01:03:51.767Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20display%20control
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-27460|2024-08-02T00:34:52.265Z -- hp%20inc. -- plantronics%20hub
item.description: A privilege escalation exists in the updater for Plantronics Hub 3.25.1 and below.

item.title: CVE-2024-3281|2024-08-01T20:05:08.210Z -- hp%20inc. -- poly%20ccx%20devices
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the firmware builds after 8.0.2.3267 and prior to 8.1.3.1301 in CCX devices. A flaw in the firmware build process did not properly restrict access to a resource from an unauthorized actor.

item.title: CVE-2024-4143|2024-08-01T20:33:52.408Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI BIOS, which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released firmware updates to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1695|2024-08-01T18:48:21.737Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20application%20enabling%20software%20driver
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Application Enabling Software Driver for certain HP PC products, which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-0794|2024-08-01T18:18:18.528Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20laserjet%20pro%2C%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.

item.title: CVE-2024-1869|2024-08-01T18:56:21.990Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet
item.description: Certain HP DesignJet print products are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure related to accessing memory out-of-bounds when using the general-purpose gateway (GGW) over port 9220.

item.title: CVE-2024-0407|2024-08-01T18:04:49.658Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, when connections made by the device back to services enabled by some solutions may have been trusted without the appropriate CA certificate in the device's certificate store.

item.title: CVE-2024-1174|2024-08-01T18:33:24.143Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro%208.0
item.description: Previous versions of HP ThinPro (prior to HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8) could potentially contain security vulnerabilities. HP has released HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8, which includes updates to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-29080|2024-07-26T15:23:58.604Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20display%20control
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-2301|2024-07-24T16:55:37.063Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20laserjet%20pro%20devices
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro devices are potentially vulnerable to a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack via the web management interface of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-2300|2024-07-19T19:52:09.327Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20advance%20mobile%20application
item.description: HP Advance Mobile Applications for iOS and Android are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure when using an outdated version of the application via mobile devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-4143|2024-07-15T21:46:41.838Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI BIOS, which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released firmware updates to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-27540|2024-06-28T19:00:28.307Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in the HP BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure. HP is releasing BIOS updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5410|2024-03-12T20:01:46.531Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been reported in the system BIOS of certain HP PC products, which might allow memory tampering. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-4063|2024-06-04T17:27:20.275Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20officejet%20pro%20printers
item.description: Certain HP OfficeJet Pro printers are potentially vulnerable to a Denial of Service when using an improper eSCL URL GET request.

item.title: CVE-2023-6138|2024-02-14T22:12:16.966Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20workstation%20pcs
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP Workstation PCs, which might allow escalation of privilege, arbitrary code execution, or denial of service. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28893|2024-06-04T18:03:29.967Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20software%20packages%20%28softpaqs%29
item.description: Certain HP software packages (SoftPaqs) are potentially vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when the SoftPaq configuration file has been modified after extraction. HP has released updated software packages (SoftPaqs).

item.title: CVE-2024-5143|2024-06-04T18:02:37.631Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20laserjet%20pro%20printers
item.description: A user with device administrative privileges can change existing SMTP server settings on the device, without having to re-enter SMTP server credentials. By redirecting send-to-email traffic to the new server, the original SMTP server credentials may potentially be exposed.

item.title: CVE-2024-1869|2024-03-01T21:31:06.701Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet
item.description: Certain HP DesignJet print products are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure related to accessing memory out-of-bounds when using the general-purpose gateway (GGW) over port 9220.

item.title: CVE-2024-1695|2024-05-06T20:47:35.746Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20application%20enabling%20software%20driver
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Application Enabling Software Driver for certain HP PC products, which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1174|2024-03-01T19:39:26.840Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro%208.0
item.description: Previous versions of HP ThinPro (prior to HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8) could potentially contain security vulnerabilities. HP has released HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8, which includes updates to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-0794|2024-02-21T00:59:55.383Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20laserjet%20pro%2C%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.

item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, when connections made by the device back to services enabled by some solutions may have been trusted without the appropriate CA certificate in the device's certificate store.
